name: UIViewControllerTransitionCoordinator
desc: A set of methods that provides support for animations associated with a view controller transition.

items.name: func animate(alongsideTransition: ((UIViewControllerTransitionCoordinatorContext) -> Void)?, completion: ((UIViewControllerTransitionCoordinatorContext) -> Void)?) -> Bool
items.desc: Runs the specified animations at the same time as the view controller transition animations.

items.name: func animateAlongsideTransition(in: UIView?, animation: ((UIViewControllerTransitionCoordinatorContext) -> Void)?, completion: ((UIViewControllerTransitionCoordinatorContext) -> Void)?) -> Bool
items.desc: Runs the specified animations in a view that is outside of the designated container view.

items.name: func notifyWhenInteractionChanges((UIViewControllerTransitionCoordinatorContext) -> Void)
items.desc: Registers a block to be executed when a transition changes from interactive to non-interactive.
